name: render-bikeability
description:
The render-bikeability command creates an interactive HTML visualization of cycling infrastructure analysis. The map shows:

- Cycling infrastructure color-coded by type (cycleways, bike lanes, shared paths)
- Bike roads and designated cycling streets
- Dangerous intersections where bike routes cross car roads
- Bike facilities (parking, rental, repair shops)
- Bikeability score with component breakdown
- Interactive layer toggles

Opens automatically in browser.
output:
Interactive HTML map with:
- Color-coded cycling infrastructure
- Intersection danger markers
- Bike facility icons
- Sidebar with scores and metrics
- Layer controls for filtering
